thread.section_title: Classificações sobre a Tap Airportugal | Comentários de clientes da Tap Airportugal | www.tap-airportugal.pt
thread.title: Franciscus Adrianus Johannes van der Heijden
thread.title_full: Tap Airportugal classificado por Franciscus Adrianus Johannes van der Heijden

author: Franciscus Adrianus Johannes van der Heijden
title: Franciscus Adrianus Johannes van der Heijden
text: We booked a ticket by an agengy and somehow the last name from my 6 year old daughter is wrong, the dont change the name and i have to book a new ticket, but you cant buy a ticket for a child only and we dont know if there is a seat on the same fleight. Why doesnt TAP help customers when it involves a child? We dont know wat to do, the agency also doesnt want to do or cant do anything.
